__e: No, I can handle Bernard, that's not the problem.
Damn, Bernard, didn't I tell you about these guys?
Bernard? You never told me you were born in this house.
I know you and I know myself.
Going to an early dinner with Bernard tonight and I don't want to be bloated, know what I'm saying? [Clicks tongue]
I spoke to Bernard today... ... and he asked me to come visit him.
Bernard reckoned you were a man to trust.
- Yes, but Bernard saw something better. - We're sorry he couldn't make it.
Several weeks ago, Andy Bernard had an incident.
